summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Office of Professional Accountability (OPA) records reviewed by the Office of Professional Accountability Review Board (OPA Review Board); providing that the OPA Review Board will have access to unredacted OPA files; setting forth the OPA Review Board's confidentiality requirements and provisions concerning indemnity; and amending Seattle Municipal Code Section 3.28.920 accordingly.
committee: Public Safety, Civil Rights and Arts
note: Returned unsigned by the Mayor on June 12, 2006
